website_summaries.verdict: Nice quality of audio in a simple soundbar design that has the subwoofer built into it.
pros: Includes a tweeter that has a higher frequency range than most soundbars on the market
No separate subwoofer required, as it's built into the soundbar itself
Soundbar hardware will connect directly to a compatible Samsung TV, creating a simple installation process
cons: Bass sounds aren't as powerful as they'd be with a separate subwoofer

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung HW-MS650 boasts advanced technology and a pleasing sound, but can't match the bass of competitors with separate subwoofers.
pros: The Samsung HW-MS650 offers very good music replay and an excellent array of features, especially for Samsung TV owners
The sound bar features HDMI in and out with 4K support, and its array of Wi-Fi features are second-to-none
cons: Lightweight bass leads to less-intense sound with movies
Wi-Fi streaming your TV's sound is more hassle than just connecting a cable

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar - Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Was not disappointed; great sound with good bass. There are a bunch of EQs to mess with (particularly for watching movies and playing video games). Adds some nice dynamic options. Someone posted on here that it turns off after 5 minutes of inactivity: that is true BUT it turns back on automatically when the media you are playing resumes. So if you pause Netflix for 10 minutes, come back and resume, the Soundbar will automatically turn back on, and it happens instantaneously. I use the HMDI ARC port to connect to my TV; highly recommended! Samsung never disappoints me, except when it's phones blow up, but we past that y'all👌
customer_reviews.author: greg pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Live in an apartment and care more about clear voice than bass... But, the bass is also very deep on this. Wouldn't even need to add a sub woofer. Very clear and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: marcus c.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality for the price. This little thing can produce loud and high quality audio with adequate amount of bass. The bass doesn't overwhelm you like many other audio system with a dedicated subwoofer which makes it ideal for bedrooms and offices. The Samsung MultiRoom app is actually very useful. I'm not a fan of Samsung sofwares in general but this one is an exception. It is an interface to nativigate many different sources of audio. You can add extra speakers by using this app to configure them. Configuration is extremely fast and painless. I came from a flagship Vizio and Sony NT5 soundbar, and the Samsung MS650 outclasses both at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Klay

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Does fit under 65” Samsung TVs.
customer_reviews.text: Lack of a subwoofer is definitely noticeable, but it does a pretty good job without it. Absolutely crazy that the optional subwoofer is $500. I wanted to write a review to specifically mention how it fits under my particular Samsung TV. My TV’s model number is UN65MU800D. I was concerned that this sound bar wouldn’t fit under it, but I’m pleased to report that it does, in fact, fit under the TV. BARELY. It doesn’t scrape, but it does touch it. See picture(s) for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arentz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Product
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar arrived dead. The unit's power would not come on or connect to the TV. Returned the item and purchased a Bose 700 from a local store. I have nothing negative to say about the sound bar itself, just that it was defective right up front. I believe that it would provide great service, but I could not wait to have another one shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound bar. The only draw back is I have to keep switching my tv sound to the sound bar because the sound bar likes to turn itself off after 5 minutes of no sound or it wont turn on when I turn my tv on. Its connected with the HDMI (ARC). The sound bar has great sound so far. It fills the room by itself with out surround speakers or a bass needed. This thing will rumble the walls all by itself in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Meurer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung HW-MS550 Sound+ Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: It was installed easily and mounted. doesn't have quite the volume other sound bars( those much higher priced) do, but certainly adequate in the average size viewing room. The volume and sound quality is improved. when pressing the "surround" button on the remote. It is very very important to read in its entirety the User's manual, particularly to use the remote properly, and to get the most out of this sound bar. If you don't you will be disappointed in its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McIndoe Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Non-Premium Soundbar – PoS
customer_reviews.text: The Non-Premium Soundbar does NOT stay connected to WiFi (Prime – Netflix) or even the 1970’s CU*Tcast coax cable box. System reverts to the TV speakers constantly while watching TV. Every time U start the system the Non-Premium Soundbar has lost all his memory / settings. We are ready to send this #PoS it to the Palm Beach County DUMP! [Who thought we would still be using 1929 Coaxial Cable in 2019?] -LJ
customer_reviews.author: LJ Bujak

customer_reviews.title: So, so happy! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I've done a lot of reading on soundbars in preparation for this purchase. I went to all my trusted tech blogs to read through their Top Ten lists. Surprisingly, they all varied. I noticed this Samsung model was on all the lists and seemed like the best bang got my back. Amazon recently had this marked down $50 making it $350. While it doesn't come with a separate wireless Amp like other soundbars, this Samsung model doesn't need it! Truly spectacular sound. It will knock your socks off. Super easy to set up. Pairs even easier with other Samsung products.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought a Yamaha YAS 108 and had to return it because there was distortion at high notes. This thing sounds clean and clear all over the sound spectrum. The bass is not the same as a subwoofer in a Jamaican dance hall, no soundbar is going to do that, but it is good enough that I'm worried about waking up my neighbors at 30% volume. It gives you a full sound with hip-hop, rock, classical, opera, electronic and I think that's all you can ask for in a sound bar. Looks great too. Setup took minutes. The remote works well too. No regrets on this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL P MAYORAL

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Excellent sound. I was skeptical due to reviews that said the built-in subwoofer wasn’t strong enough, but I’m using this in my Bedroom and it is plenty powerful for my use to fill a 14x 15’ room. I have the Q80 sound bar in my living room, but I feel the HW-MS650 is perfect for my bedroom. It said it would take a week to ship to me as many products during the COVID19 pandemic, but I received it in 2 days! Watched an action movie last night, and it sounded great as I probably disturbed the neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Barkus

customer_reviews.title: Does it work with alexa “as a speaker”
customer_reviews.text: The works with Alexa certification is misleading. You cannot use this as an Alexa speaker, unless you pair it using bluetooth. I. A whole home audio setup, multiple alexa devices stream music to fill the home with audio. Bit, the catch is, you cannot do that when you pair bluetooth speakers to Alexa due to different delays in signal transmission and decoding. As this device is wifi, and certied works woth alexa, you would think it would. As it turns out, Alexa only sees this a a generic device, not a speaker. So I still have a fragmented audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look..not so steady sound
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this soundbar to go with our new Samsung smart tv. I really like the look of the soundbar and how well it sits in front of the tv. We are not able use wifi or bluetooth so it is connected using the optical cableFor the most part the sound is pretty decent however, it will go in and out while we are watching tv. We it seems to happen more often when we are watching sports so I am not sure if not having the sound setting on either sports or clear voice makes a difference but the sound should not be going in and out, regardless of the setting.
customer_reviews.author: Katana73

customer_reviews.title: JUNK! STAY AWAY ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: If I could do this again....I WOULD NOT DO IT!!! As much as I like Samsung products...this is a piece of junk. It will not ever connect to WiFi....(without unplugging the sound bar to get it to connect). This is unacceptable. I spent way to much money on this product to experience this kind of uselessness. So disappointed. 🤨🙁😩
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Amazing Sound, Easy Set up
customer_reviews.text: Love it. 1st, it fits perfect under my new Samsung 55” Q8F TV. Then of course the sound is amazing. I have it linked to the Samsung SWA- 9000S/ZA wireless speakers. Both via WiFi. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Does not handle LPCM 5.1
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent sounding unit, considering its size. The soundstage is really narrow though, so if you're looking for good L/R separation, you'll need a wider soundbar (or a setup with dedicated speakers). My largest complaint with this unit though, is that it cannot handle LPCM 5.1 audio. So if you're looking to get surround sound from the Nintendo Switch, or any other device that outputs LPCM surround sound, then this soundbar is not going to work for oyu.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Flesner

customer_reviews.title: Turns off when pausing show.
customer_reviews.text: Whenever you pause your show or movie the Soundbar TURNS OFF, so you have to look for the Remote Control and turn it on again. Very annoying and NO HELP from Samsung. They took Power Saving to another level.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaReadsAlot

customer_reviews.title: Could not get to work.
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this to log on to my wifi no matter what I tried. Tech support was absolutely worhless. I visited forum after forum and after I noticed that lots of other people had same problem, I returned it. It should not be that hard to install. I got a Polk audio soundbar and it installed seamlessly and easily. I'm sure the Samsung had better sound, but if I can't get it to wifi, I can't use Alexa with it.
customer_reviews.author: johnu

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound - unexpected surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I gave up a 5.1 sub / sat system that I loved (Orb Audio) to move into to the Samsung Ultra HD 4K world. Even without a sub this sound bar has remarkable range. The most striking feature is the "clear voice" setting. If you have ever watched anything and had trouble hearing the dialog clearly, this is a dream come true. And it still has lots of low frequency response. I will add the external sub and surround kit for the next step but for now this was a pleasant sonic surprise. **BONUS - If you have gone big with the 75" Samsung 4K... this fits perfectly between the feet. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Howard Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soundbar with no need for subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I rate this product a buy. Pro: Good sound with no need for subwoofer. Easy install and works on other newer Samsung TV on the same Wi-Fi network. Cons: I have two of these and when connecting to Smarter Things iPhone app it errors out and required multiple attempts. While this didn’t affect the operation of device, connecting to Smart Things morning gone app took several tries. For this model, consider buying Manufacturer refurbished from Amazon at discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Toy Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Does not play as loud as a (advertised) "360 Watt" audio device should.
customer_reviews.text: Connected via HDMI. Seems well put together and the sound at normal (low) tv volumes is good quality. My issue is that it just doesn't get very loud at max volume, it certainly doesn't achieve the volume level that any audio device claiming "360 Watts" ought to reach. That makes it disappointing for both movies and music. Contacted Samsung tech support and they had no ability to help. I'm believe Samsung just uses a big number in the watt rating because they think it will help them sell.
customer_reviews.author: Inventive D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Terrible Support and ARC Input
customer_reviews.text: I think this has great sound in a compact form. Not really any need for a subwoofer. My issue with this soundbar is that the ARC doesn't work and I'm using it with a Samsung TV! It should be plug and play, no problems. Had to try resetting the ARC connection, new cables, etc. Just decided to go with the optical input and not worry about it but part of the reason for buying this was so the TV and soundbar would talk to each other. Oh well - at least it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a low to mid priced soundbar this definitely hits the spot. Perfect for a apartment! Quality is definitely there, looks good, feels sturdy. Functionality. I realize it's a a year and a half old, but the one remote function is amazing, and the option to eventually add a sub is awesome. Only gave tech support three stars because I haven't had to call them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Tempermental
customer_reviews.text: We have had this speaker for 10 months now. As noted by other reviewers, we have constant problems with it turning itself off. It turns itself off as soon as it turns on. it turns itself off while we are watching a program. It turns itself off when you adjust the volume up or down. It is sporadic and annoying. Some of the time, it not only turns off, but also changes the sound setting in the TV where we have to go into the menu settings and set it correctly. Good sound for a soundbar, but completely annoying and unreliable. It is hooked up to a Samsung tv so its supposed to integrate 'smoothly' with the same brand equipment.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Died after one year and Samsung tech support was awful.
customer_reviews.text: Bar sounded good, but there was a slight lag. This was present in all connection modes (HDMI, optical and WIFI). After a year of use the sound bar quit working. The power would come on, but the only source that appears is DJN. Called Samsung and they were useless. After 6 phone calls and me sending the unit back to them twice Samsung refused to honor the warranty. I will never buy anything Samsung again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zawierucha

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Blown / Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sound bar along with a Samsung TV less than a year ago. Soundbar started buzzing as if the speaker has blown. I'm not one to blast the speakers on high volume, pretty typical use in all honesty. Considering the price of this soundbar and it lasted less than a year, I would highly encourage you to look elsewhere. UPDATE Sent the soundbar back to Samsung to get fixed. Within 3 days they told me it was unfixable and offered to replace it (Cool, right?) Fast forward 4 weeks later, I still haven't received said replacement and haven't received any correspondence from Samsung in last 2 weeks. I'd not recommend this product based on poor customer service alone.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with the quality of this soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the quality of this soundbar! Read and watched TONS of reviews online on this specific product saying that it was a steal for that price (which was 500+ bucks at the time!) so when I saw the current price, I jumped on it and was NOT disappointed. It's crazy how much of a difference it makes compared to the default speakers of my 4k (2017 model) TV. The 4 stars instead of 5 is because the ARC connection takes sometimes a couple of seconds to sync up with the TV. Besides that, it's a HUGE step up without breaking the bank :)
customer_reviews.author: Renaud Galand

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Fail
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Is NOT Alexa compatible. I have been dealing with Alexa support for several weeks and they cannot make it work correctly. No matter what they do Alexa thinks that the soundbar is a light switch and therefore will not play music on it. FYI my Samsung smart hub sees the device as a soundbar so the issue is definitely with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this is by far exceeding my expectations. The bass is surprisingly nice considering there is no separate subwoofer. It is hooked to my Vizio TV (all my devices are run by a Harmony remote) and works very well with the optical cable. The system projects well to all parts of the room without overwhelming any one spot or having dead spots in the room. Voices are nice and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Better than the built in tv speakers. Not a lot of bass but we listen to a lot of stations that have voice versus music and action. The clear voice mode accentuates the voice which is good. Overall a decent cost effective sound bar. However the sounds seems to radiate more up and out versus forward which is why we also bought the Samsung rear speakers which is good for action but not voice/dialogue
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound with tv good sound music with WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Like easy to set up but I do have Samsung tv. Sound really not that great doesn’t have much punch. Always have to used smart button with that on sound ok tv sound I’ll give it a 5 out of 10. But used my phone with WiFi much better still have to used smart button why they have other it bad. I really thought it would be good Sonos blow it away but sonos software is bad. Also 200 more for bar if I had it I would pic Sonos for sure
customer_reviews.author: Steelersman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, multiple settings, nice display,compact remote.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want for low cost but very good sound quality. Multiple settings so you can go Movie, increase Voices (which is a biggy for me), or Music to enhance stereo sound through the 7 speakers. Plenty loud to fill the room, but you won't support a dance party out from there to out on your deck. I love the display which shows what setting you're on and flashes the # of the volume each time you touch that button. LOVE the remote. Compact with up/down toggle for volume that you also push straight down to mute - no more squinting/searching to find the mute!
customer_reviews.author: K. Willson

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Soundbar but big.
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar is the nicest sounding one I've ever purchased and I've had a few. The controls are simple the presets are nice and it looks great on a manhole or TV stand. My only issue is I have it mounted to the Samsung soundbar wall mount that goes under the TV and it's very heavy. I really like the sound bar though
customer_reviews.author: Jay Deluxe

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Great but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and clear. It does not have a sub. When you put your show on pause for too long the speaker turns off. This is very annoying because the TV remote will not turn it back on unless you turn off the TV first and then back on. This then requires you to go back and rejoin your program.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diss
customer_reviews.text: 🙁. Disappointed the price has gone down lots🙁. Also I find it big for my living room and the sound could be better, for the price I paid. The base is so loud I only use it when company comes over. I actually thought I could hear the YV in other rooms of my house with the sound bar but 🙁 not🙁 Also cannot connect my iPad Pro my iphoneX to the sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: The sound was pretty good, sounded rich and fairly clear (no bass). After only 3 years of occasional use in the bedroom, it died today. I replaced it with an upper end system. It was just disappointing that I paid $400 for a soundbar and have it die so quickly. I don't think electronic equipment is built to last like it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: bek

customer_reviews.title: Dont but this until you figured it all out. When you have please let me know
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I dislike the most. The mounting bracket for the soundbar, the sound bar mounting options, the cheaply made mounting bracket option from Samsung. I really don't have time for this. I guess I'll start deciding what to return first.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I can now hear dialog and voice perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Traded up from a less-expensive VISIO that didn’t have HDMI ARC and couldn’t connect to my Samsung Q6 and petmit my DirecTV controller to function. This Samsung sound bar instantly connected without any configuration and the sound is SUBSTANTIALLY better than the VISIO — even with integrated subwoofers. Definitely mid-range in price, but high performance in sound!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Paid for open box but was like new. Only disadvantage of this product was it gets in the way of the TV receiver for the remote functions. Gotta place the TV higher to get signal from TV remote to TV. My previous soundbar sat flush with the TV. Overall great product for the price and is compatible with the Samsung external subwoofer I purchased separately. Only reason I bought this soundbar was to make the subwoofer work.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my Samsung TV, I was able to replace a bulky and unsightly small speaker system I was using. It can get pretty loud and my kids love using the Bluetooth feature with their friends to play music.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for four months then the arc just stopped working. I called Samsung support and worked with them for 45 minutes could not get it to work tried Bluetooth could not connect tries wifi this did not work either. I used the optical cable this worked but sound volume dropped by 50%. I tried a second hdmi cable and nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It stop working
customer_reviews.text: My sound at isn’t working!! It’s on but no sound is coming from it. I need assistance ASAP. I haven’t had it that long
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but huge issue
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound on this speaker but twice I’ve had an issue where it won’t stop turning off and on over and over again. The first time it happened I factory reset it and that worked but now I can’t get it to stop. Even if I unplug it and plug it back in it won’t stop. If this problem didn’t keep happening I would love this sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up with correct TV. Got rid of Boss tower speakers and amplifier and rearranged toe room GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar won't stay on when TV is on hold.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar turns off as designed after 4-5 minutes of TV on hold, and won't come back on with out the sound bar remote turn back on. There is no stand-by, as with other quality sound-bars. I contacted Samsung and wasted 30 minutes while on and off hold, only to find there is no software fix for this issue. I have replaced two of these sound-bars for this reason alone. The quality and features are just OK. Check out Zbox SB-500, much better sound, and goes off and on with the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cole

customer_reviews.title: Worst sound bar ever. Sounds great when working but that’s rare.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is terrible!! Not only does it lock you off of Bluetooth every 10 seconds so you have to keep reconnecting.... totally makes you not even want to listen to music or use it at all but it also disconnects from the Samsung app and becomes undiscoverable. I’ve had this for one month and I’ve already had to reconnect it four times to the tv and right now it’s just not connecting again at all. I am two days past returning window therefore I’m stuck with this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Samsung Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Can use Sansung TV remote to control volume. Setup was easy. Had to call support over my misunderstanding over a setup issue. Support walked me through the steps to fix the problem, very helpful. We have 2 Samsung TVs, and a Samsung Smart TV, and the Samsung Soundbar. All work lika a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid sound bar, once you get it pairs with your other speakers which were annoying to get done, the instructions I got were not really clear and it wasn’t seen less to do but the sound is worth it’s sound is excellent and it has a great sound depth
customer_reviews.author: Long Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Muffled Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar does not amplify clear sound for our baby boomer ears. We thought that getting a sound bar would IMPROVE the sound emitted from the speakers located on the back of our flat screen tv. Wrong. When hooked up, the sound is muffled and delayed. May help gamers with hearing a bass sound track of explosions, but for us the sound is garbled and delayed. We are returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hondrogen

customer_reviews.title: Slight improvement over tv speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so it would be compatible with my Samsung tv Sound is a bit better than tv; set up is sloppy; tech support is very poor, misinformed. The manual is poorly written. I would never buy this if I had to do it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Javier lc

customer_reviews.title: Better then the Bose stand alone soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Bout a Bose sound bar & returned it. Compared to the sound quality of this item, honestly the Bose didn't even come close. Connected w/my LG tv, Alexa, google assistant w/ease. Looking for a low price stand alone soundbar w/o a wireless subwoofer lookn further.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but loses connectiivty to woofer
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great with TV (Samsung) except if pause - lose sound bar connection. Then lose Bluetooth connection to Samsung Woofer. need fix for the loss of connections - if you can do a wired sound bar and woofer - do it
customer_reviews.author: RD Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Volume control option on the remote is not offered....
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound from this sound bar, I hate the lack of volume control on the remote and having to get up every time I need to make adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Sound and Power!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! I'm a ex Navy Seal and I know what electronics behavior is like. I know I made a good choice over this product. And the sound is incredible, I recommend this sound system a 10 plus!! Thank You and good job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: TOPGUN-5

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Much better base then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Great sound. Much better base then I expected. I will not need to purchase a receiver because the sound bar meets all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dud

customer_reviews.title: Large but Works well
customer_reviews.text: It may be me but unable to get the Samsung TV remote to work the Volume.... using different remotes currently. When and if I get some free time, I may have to sit down and configure it, which means the Setup was quick and easy and was able to get sound immediately and the quality is decent keep it around volume 18 in a 1000 sq. ft. room is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Family

customer_reviews.title: Keep turning on with a reboot from somewhere
customer_reviews.text: We ended up turning the damn soundbar off as i went into setting on TV and canceled automatic reboot and the damn thing turns on anyway... this model. HW-MS650/ZA . PLUS there is no info on Samung
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar, works good with all brands of TV’s
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sound bar with lots of features. Works good with all TV’s but has some added features with a newer Samsung TV. I got this as I wanted a good loud sound bar that did not has a stand alone subwoofer. It is a big sound bar measuring 41” long and 5” deep. I have been very pleased with it with general tv watching but it does really well with blu ray discs and Netflix/Amazon prime movies.
customer_reviews.author: TanMan304

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE BUT GREAT SOUND WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound from this sound bar. It is heavy, Tooks others advice and mounted to wall. Too heavy to mount to TV with optional TV mount Holder which apparently is not designed to handle the weight. Like others said may not need optional Subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hallquist

customer_reviews.title: I don't like when it randomly turns off when I'm away from ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like when it randomly turns off when I'm away from in for 5 min sometimes. Other times it just stays on. The quailty of the sound is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so this is one nice bar. I have a Samsung Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Replaced another brand sound bar. Guess you get what you pay for, so this is one nice bar. I have a Samsung Smart TV, so set up was very easy. Sounds quite a bit better than my other unit plus after 4 months, doesn't sound like I blew out the speakers. Also use with phone to stream music. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kid Flash

customer_reviews.title: Samsung HW-MS550
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the soundbar just better than expected. So enjoyable and unbelievable quality for movies dialogs, music, build in subwoofer is absolutely enough for anything to listen. Thank you for a great job Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Worst sound product that claims to have 450 watts when in actuality it was less then 50 watts! Don’t waste your time and money on this worthless product from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't come hdm Cable so make sure to get one at same time
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have Samsung tv and the sound wasn't the greatest. The great thing was all you have to do is plug in power cord and 1 cord to the TV and the TV does the rest. And all you have do is use one remote I have spectrum cable and there remote turns sound bar and the TV at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Roku streaming device and a Samsung TV this is the soundbar for you. Roku tells you their remote will not control soundbars. However, if you have a soundbar of the same make as your TV, at least for Samsung, you can control both. This Soundbar has great sound. the digital display on the bar gives you the sound level.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Burch

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sound bar to provide sound superior to TV speakers and it has accomplished just that. I'm able to hear audio as it was meant to be heard. The sound bar was easy to set up and has capabilities that, while I may not use them (eg. blue tooth), are available should I decide to use them. I heartily recommend the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Actually this Soundbar for the money it's a great soundbar I like it and I only had it for maybe a month haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: luis velasco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome aound quality. Much better than my Phillips aound bar with aubwoofers i had earlier. Without external subwoofer it takes less space also which is great for a small apartment like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik

customer_reviews.title: sound
customer_reviews.text: easy to install,sound is great, works with my cable box control,once set up very easy to use. recommend to everyone who wants better sound. My Samsung t.v. made hookup very easy using optical cable supplied. Now t.v. operates sound bar. Has surround sound,clear voice ,music, what ever you want.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Christmas and we love it so far! Very sleek look, which is what we wanted! I also love that there are no visible buttons for our little guy to keep pushing! The sound is super crisp and clean and I feel like it fills up the room, when needed! Great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for our TV which had nice picture but horrible sound. Ideal for TV shows with quite a bit of dialogue as it presents voices in a clear and crisp manner.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but poor Alexa integration. Setup was a royal hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sedita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to provide more depth of sound for a 65” Samsung tv that is in my bedroom. Love the sound improvement. No competition for true surround sound, but it’s perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJAnderson

customer_reviews.title: best surround sound ever purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best surround sound I ever purchase the music on here grade sound effects is great beats I cannot tell you how great it is I am so thankful that I made this purchase anything with Samsung purchase is a good deal with me whoever wants to have Surround Sounds this is the surround sound for you.
customer_reviews.author: Holland E.Shauntee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good bass. Some tips to connect it
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. The embedded bass sounds really powerful. I connected it to my TV (Samsung 6100) through the HDMI-ARC and it recognized it instantly. A couple of tips: * When you connect it to the TV using HDMI-ARC: reset/reboot/restart the sound configuration of your TV so it can recognize it * Download the app "Samsung Multiroom" in your phone, look for the soundbar and update the software/firmware of it to the latest version (using the app) * It's 110v-240v autoswitch. You don't need a transformer to connect it (I'm using it connected to 220v).
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality sound bar with simple hook up for the price. On the downside I wish it would have come with an included subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Compa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all in one speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing either with hdmi cable or Bluetooth Sound is amazing so crisp and clean and just enough bass without vibrating the fixtures in the room. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Clausing

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Based upon the reviews I expected this sound bar to be louder and have higher sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy V

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing volume.
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering, I gave Samsung my TV model and SN, asking for a recommendation, which they provided. If I drive it via an Iphone BT link it is great. Using the fiber link to the TV is poor. After screwing with all options it was sort of acceptable, provided no one was speaking in the room. At max volume, and a quite movie passage, light conversation in the room, or adjacent room, will dominate.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Aranguren

customer_reviews.title: It was too big or i would have kept it.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar was more for a larger room. The size was too big for my room. But omg the sound was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Milena

customer_reviews.title: Great full sound
customer_reviews.text: Great full sound, wireless connectivity. Helps improve standard new tv sound over regular tv speakers. Not as powerful as I expected, but fuller and more rich. For BIG sound get the extra speakers. For a small room, but needing more detailed sound it's perfect on its own. Won't blow your eardrums out :).
customer_reviews.author: David Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar with rich sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great soundbar - a simple improvement to the TV speaker, but it produces rich sound. Highly recommend if you want to upgrade your TV's sound without a more comprehensive, surround sound system. Pairs easily with Samsung smart TV!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great, Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is really clear. We bought this in used, like-new condition. Thus, the price was a bit more acceptable. This is a very well built item which matches well with our Samsung QLED monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy to set up and sync with new Samsung TV. Great sound without any additional speakers. I did turn the TV sound down to a 1 and now all of the sound is from the soundbar. The eliminated the echo or slight delay immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing, sufferes from connecting issues
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amazing, and it looks amazing too. Only issues with this product is the setup was annoying for me and it will randomly stop playing sound. I have to turn off the tv and turn it back on to get sound again. Mines set up with a samsung 4k smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: Pcamp

customer_reviews.title: Avoid lengthy time with Samsung’s customer “service”
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months, it became stuck on digital input and was unresponsive to anything else. It’s pretty much a giant paper weight, and as you’ll see from many other reviews, Samsung’s customer support is horrible. Working on getting a repair now. But after only 6 months? Huge disappointment. Take your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: chipper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needs an added subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: The bass on this unit is not at all satisfying. You need to add a subwoofer to achieve the true room rumbling bass.
customer_reviews.author: Ess Are

customer_reviews.title: Great for crunchy chewers
customer_reviews.text: This bar is a nice addition to dinner time. Oftentimes i can’t hesr my husband crunch which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Turt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. He hooked it up to tv which was sound board compatible.
customer_reviews.author: JeanF

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar. Can be a little wonky with my Harmony remote, but overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Interrante

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did everything that I wanted to and sounds great .
customer_reviews.author: John Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soundbar! Got it to pair my 4k smart tv and wow does this soundbar get loud. Also has great features to control them via the app as well as connecting your amazon echo. Bluetooh / wifi compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our customer and they love it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well with my new Samsung TV, my only complaint is that I have to use more than one remote since I have cable TV.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki K Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked for the 2 weeks I had it. Now it is just JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on May 16 2020 and by May 28 it quit working. Called Samsung support and they confirmed it is not working correctly. It starts cutting on and out and if you play music it sounds like a skipping cd. Got a second one and on July 10 it started cutting on and off just like first one
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kiselka

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar makes my tv audio sound so much better.
customer_reviews.author: suedognut

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the value
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker for the value that I could find. Voices are clear and it's surprisingly loud with decent bass.
customer_reviews.author: Sachmo321

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is crisp and has enough base. Very good product for price, and also very user friendly - plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, excellent compatibility with Samsung QN65Q7FN TV
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with my new Samsung QN65Q7FN TV, seamless integration, no wires
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Saints good, really!
customer_reviews.text: Connected to tv. It’s good for online music listening. Works perfect with action films and games.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

product_meta.title: Samsung 3.0 Sound+ Premium Soundbar HW-MS650/ZA with Built-In Subwoofer, Works with Alexa, Wide-Range Tweeter, 4K Pass-Through with HDR, Multiroom Compatible, Bluetooth Compatible, 450-Watts, Black
product_meta.description: Style:3.0 SoundbarThe Samsung 3.0 Sound+ Premium Soundbar HW-MS650/ZA with Built-In Subwoofer delivers room-filling, home theater sound without the need for a separate subwoofer. Designed with streamlined wires and an elegant easy mount option, Sound+ becomes one with your TV and brings your entire cinematic experience together like never before. The 450-watt HW-MS650/ZA delivers all-around perfect sound, no matter where you are in the room, thanks to Samsung’s wide range tweeter. Distortion Cancelling technology predicts and cancels out distortion before it happens. Multi-speaker control increases the power and depth of bass by precisely coordinating the movement of each speaker for richer, more detailed bass. Enjoy your soundbar hands-free using Alexa voice control to make your music come alive with your voice. For added multiroom wireless functionality, you can connect your soundbar to your Samsung TV with ease and without the clutter of wires via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. For gamers, Game Mode Pro offers a unique setting that boosts game sound effects for an immersive gaming experience. Home theater enthusiasts will appreciate the 4K pass-through option with HDR compatibility, allowing you to pass-through high definition audio with pristine quality matching that of your UHD HDR video. The soundbar is wireless surround sound ready with the addition of an optional Wireless Surround Kit (sold separately) to expand your soundbar and subwoofer into a multi-channel home theater system. Note: If the unit doesn’t receive an audio signal from the TV for 5 minutes, it will power down. This is not a functional issue.
feature_bullets: HOME THEATER SOUND: 9 speakers with dedicated amps let you experience rich, room-filling home theater sound from a one-piece soundbar without the need for a separate subwoofer
WIDE-RANGE TWEETER: Hear consistently great sound anywhere in the room with tweeters that cover a much wider frequency range
ALEXA VOICE CONTROL: Enjoy your soundbar hands-free using Alexa voice control by simply saying the song title or a few lines of the lyrics (Alexa device sold separately)

DISTORTION CANCELLING TECHNOLOGY: Predicts and cancels out distortion before it happens; Multi-speaker control increases the power and depth of bass by precisely coordinating the movement of each speaker
4K PASS-THROUGH WITH HDR: Built-in 4K pass-through for connecting to UHD 4K sources for a seamless audio experience that matches your video
MULTIROOM WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY: Use Bluetooth or connect to Wi-Fi to play your music through Samsung's Multiroom App to stream songs from your phone or tablet
Connectivity Technology: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Hdmi, Usb

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars559 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
